addDice() - Method in class DiceRoller.DiceRoller

printDiceList() - Method in class DiceRoller.DiceRoller
Prints out a list of all the dice in the program by printing each dice's name, separated by spaces.

R

removeAllDice() - Method in class DiceRoller.DiceRoller
Clears the dice_list by removing all the dice from it.
removeDice() - Method in class DiceRoller.DiceRoller
Asks the user for the number of sides of a dice and removes the first dice with that number of sides from the dice_list.
roll() - Method in class DiceRoller.Dice
Rolls the dice and returns a random integer between 1 and the number of sides on the dice.
rollAllDice() - Method in class DiceRoller.DiceRoller
Rolls all the dice in the program and returns a map where the keys are the names of the dice and the values are the results of the dice roll.

scanner - Variable in class DiceRoller.DiceRoller
 
searchDice(int) - Method in class DiceRoller.DiceRoller
Searches the dice_list for the first dice with a certain number of sides and returns the index of that dice in the list.
showAllDice() - Method in class DiceRoller.DiceRoller
Prints out a list of all the dice that are currently in the program.
showMenu() - Method in class DiceRoller.DiceRoller
Prints out a menu for the user to select an option with.
showRollResult() - Method in class DiceRoller.DiceRoller
Clears the console, prints out the result of rolling all the dice in the program, and then waits for the user to press any key.
